demandesAuthentification.title: Document authentication requests
demandesAuthentification.paymentRequiredFirstDesc: The authentication request is only created after your payment is confirmed. Fill in the form then pay the amount shown.
demandesAuthentification.paymentStepDesc: Choose a payment method below. Once payment is confirmed, your request will be created and you will receive your ADN code.
demandesAuthentification.createSuccess: Request created. You can notify institutions or view details.
demandesAuthentification.attributedOrgCannotAdd: As the attributed institution, you cannot add documents. Only institutions notified by the applicant can upload documents.
demandesAuthentification.justCreatedMessage: Your request has been created. Share this ADN code with the attributed institution or institutions you wish to notify.
demandesAuthentification.attributedTitle: Requests assigned to the institution for document upload
demandesAuthentification.attributedDescription: List of requests assigned to you; you must add the document for each request.

institutChoice.label: Document recipient
institutChoice.fromList: Choose an institution from the list
institutChoice.invite: Invite an institution by name and email

inviteInstituts.title: Invite an institution (name and email)
inviteInstituts.description: Enter the institution's name and email. They will receive an email to sign up; after registration, the request will appear in their space and they can upload the document.
inviteInstituts.addOneRequired: Please add at least one institution (name and email).
inviteInstituts.alreadyInList: This email is already in the list.

doc.deleteConfirm: Delete this document to add another one?
doc.institutDetails: Details of the institution that submitted the document

upload.oneDocumentMax: This request already has a document. Only one document per request is allowed.

codeADN.title: Access by ADN code
codeADN.description: Enter the ADN code provided by the applicant to access the request and view or upload the document.
codeADN.notFound: No request found for this code.
codeADN.subscriptionRequiredDesc: Your organization must have an active subscription to enter an ADN code and view documents.
codeADN.noOrganization: You must be linked to an organization.

demandesAuthentification.tabsCodeHint: Enter the ADN code above and submit to load the request.

invitationAccept.title: Create my account – Authentication request invitation
invitationAccept.invalidDesc: This invitation link does not exist, has expired, or has already been used.
invitationAccept.infoMessage: You have been invited to submit a document for an authentication request. Create your account to access the request in your space.
invitationAccept.accountTypeFixed: Account type is fixed: Institute / University / College. It cannot be changed.
invitationAccept.success: Account created. Log in to access the request.

demandesAuthentification.onlyAttributedOrgCanAdd: Only the institution to which the request is assigned can add the document (one document per request).
demandesAuthentification.viewDocumentsReadOnly: You can view the documents of this request in read-only mode (access reserved for institutions with an active subscription).
demandesAuthentification.documentAlreadyAdded: The document has already been submitted for this request.
